questions.question: What is the time complexity of accessing an element in an array by index?
questions.explanation: Array elements are stored in contiguous memory locations, allowing constant time access.

questions.question: Which data structure follows the FIFO principle?
questions.explanation: FIFO means First In First Out, which is followed by a Queue.

questions.question: Which keyword is used to inherit a class in Java?
questions.explanation: The 'extends' keyword is used to inherit a class in Java.
